name: escape #LD51
description:
escape

Try outrunning the explosion!

Controls:

Up Arrow / W - accelerate

Down Arrow / S - slow down

Left Arrow / A - turn left

Right Arrow / D - turn right

esc - menu

I didn't have much time this weekend so I made this in the last day of the JAM :) ENJOY!

Made with:

- engine: Godot 3.5.1

- graphics: Krita 5.1.1

- music: beepbox.co

- some sound effects, font and the flame sprite: kenney.nl
